name: The Sky Lord
text: Activate this card only if you have a Level 7 or higher "Arcana Force" monster in your Graveyard. You can send this face-up card, 1 "The Material Lord", and 1 "The Spiritual Lord" from your field to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Arcana Force EX - The Light Ruler" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
